Footer.description: Redefining the concept of exclusivity and comfort in stunning destinations surrounded by nature.
Footer.newsletterDesc: Receive exclusive curations directly in your email.

Amenities.title: What this place offers
Amenities.subtitle: Exclusive amenities designed to provide an incomparable living experience.
Amenities.parkingDesc: Covered garage for up to 6 luxury vehicles.
Amenities.wineCellarDesc: Space for your collection with humidity control.
Amenities.cinemaDesc: Projection room with Dolby Atmos audio.

Mission.headline: Nature. Comfort.
Mission.description: An authentic Brazilian Sitio with 2.6 hectares of nature. Pool, BBQ, offroad trails, and complete privacy. Your refuge away from the city.

Gallery.title: Photo Gallery
Gallery.subtitle: Spaces and moments at Sítio Girassol

Thesis.title: Why Girassol
Thesis.subtitle: A meticulously designed harmony between contemporary luxury and the vibrant soul of wild nature.
Thesis.natureDesc: Active preservation and direct contact with the local ecosystem. Feel the pulse of the forest at every sunrise.
Thesis.comfortDesc: Premium suites with original design and organic materials, created for your absolute relaxation and regeneration.
Thesis.experienceDesc: Curated exclusive moments, from sustainable fine dining to private exploration itineraries.

Location.label: Location
Location.title: São Roque
Location.description: Located in the countryside of São Roque, a few minutes from the best markets and local conveniences. 60 km from São Paulo.

CTA.title: Ready to book your stay?
CTA.description: Transform your moments into unforgettable memories. Our team is ready to welcome you with the highest standard of hospitality.
